summary: Filmmaker Rob Stewart advances the theory that though humans depend on the natural world for subsistence, humans are nature's greatest enemy.
cast: Nnimmo Bassey|Krystyna Bednarska|Adrienne Maree Brown|Lester Brown|Tony Clarke|Clare Demerse|Katharina Fabricius|Felix Finkbeiner|David Hannan|Emily Hunter|Van Jones|Ronald Jumeau|Martin Khor|Peter Knights|Melina Laboucan-Massimo|Bill McKibben|Patrick Moore|Kandi Mossett|Kathy Pagapular|Serge Rajaobelina|Mike Roselle|John Schellnhuber|Nicholas Stern|Rob Stewart|Jessy Tolkan|Charlie Veron|Andrew Weaver|Boris Worm
title: Revolution
